details:
Several issues have been discovered with tcpdump in the way it
handled some printer protocols. Those issues can lead to denial
of service, or, potentially, execution of arbitrary code.


* [CVE-2015-0261](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2015-0261)
Missing bounds checks in IPv6 Mobility printer
* [CVE-2015-2154](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2015-2154)
Missing bounds checks in ISOCLNS printer
* [CVE-2015-2155](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2015-2155)
Missing bounds checks in ForCES printer


For Debian 6 Squeeze, these issues have been fixed in tcpdump version tcpdump\_4.1.1-1+deb6u2


Thanks to Romain FranĂ§oise who prepared this update.
